page.title: 07SARAH'S DAY
page.content: I get up at 7.30 and put my clothes on. I go down stairs, comb my hair and get my breakfast. At 8.20 I have a drink then I put on my coat and go to school at 8.30. Mrs Sumby does the register and we do some work till play_time. We have our milk and go out at quarter to 11. I usually play with the skipping rope. When we come in from play_time we have numbers or art. After dinner we have a play_time and then we have story. When I go home I watch television or play rounders. At half past 6 I have my tea and go out until half past 7. I go to bed at quarter to nine.
